Monologue.Original: “Thump-thump... thump-thump...”

Monologue.Original: Garden Faculty{Line}“Dincht... Zell Dincht.”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“OHHH, YEAHHHH!”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“OHHH, YEAHHHH!”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“See ya!”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“See ya!”

Monologue.Current: Garden Faculty{Line}“{Char Squall}... {Char Squall} from Squad B.{Line} Please step forward.”
Monologue.Original: Garden Faculty{Line}“{Char Squall}... {Char Squall} from Squad B.{Line} Please step forward.”

Monologue.Current: Garden Faculty{Line}“That is all.{Line} Dismissed.”
Monologue.Original: Garden Faculty{Line}“That is all.{Line} Dismissed.”

Monologue.Current: “I’m so ready to pass{Line} this SeeD exam and{Line} become a SeeD member.”
Monologue.Original: “I’m so ready to pass{Line} this SeeD exam and{Line} become a SeeD member.”

Monologue.Current: “And...{Line} How many times have you taken it?”
Monologue.Original: “And...{Line} How many times have you taken it?”

Monologue.Current: “Th-Th-Three...{Line} 3 times now.”
Monologue.Original: “Th-Th-Three...{Line} 3 times now.”

Monologue.Current: “I see, the third time{Line} is always a charm.”
Monologue.Original: “I see, the third time{Line} is always a charm.”

Monologue.Current: “What about you?{Line} How far along are you?”
Monologue.Original: “What about you?{Line} How far along are you?”

Monologue.Current: “Me?{Line} At the rate I’m going,{Line} I’ll take the exam next term.”
Monologue.Original: “Me?{Line} At the rate I’m going,{Line} I’ll take the exam next term.”

Monologue.Current: “It’ll be my first time.{Line} My goal is to be like{Line} Instructor Quistis Trepe.”
Monologue.Original: “It’ll be my first time.{Line} My goal is to be like{Line} Instructor Quistis Trepe.”

Monologue.Current: “She became a SeeD at age 15{Line} and an instructor by 17!{Line} It’s so impressive.”
Monologue.Original: “She became a SeeD at age 15{Line} and an instructor by 17!{Line} It’s so impressive.”

Monologue.Current: “She’s my idol.”
Monologue.Original: “She’s my idol.”

Monologue.Current: “Yeah,{Line} mine, too.”
Monologue.Original: “Yeah,{Line} mine, too.”

Monologue.Current: “Hey,{Line} maybe you have{Line} a crush on her?”
Monologue.Original: “Hey,{Line} maybe you have{Line} a crush on her?”

Monologue.Current: “What!? No!{Line} It’s not like that at all.”
Monologue.Original: “What!? No!{Line} It’s not like that at all.”

Monologue.Current: “Yeah, right...”
Monologue.Original: “Yeah, right...”

Monologue.Current: “Anyway, I’m gonna{Line} rock this exam!”
Monologue.Original: “Anyway, I’m gonna{Line} rock this exam!”

Monologue.Current: “Don’t get hurt now.{Line} Good luck.”
Monologue.Original: “Don’t get hurt now.{Line} Good luck.”

Monologue.Current: “Ничего подобного!” // Парень
Monologue.Original: “This is nothing!{Line} I ain’t{Line} discouraged yet.”

Monologue.Current: // Девчонка №2 после сдачи экзамена{Line}“Всегда можно попробовать ещё раз.{Line} Будет новый день...{Line} Эх... гнилая отмазка...”
Monologue.Original: “There’s always next time.{Line} Tomorrow’s another day...{Line} Maybe that’s not a good attitude.”

Monologue.Current: // Заходит девушка и обращается{Line}// к парню и девчонке внизу{Line}“Привет, малыш.”
Monologue.Original: “Oh, hey, brother.”

Monologue.Current: “Йо!”
Monologue.Original: “Yo!”

Monologue.Current: “Сегодня нужно сходить в город.{Line} У нас закончилась преправа.”
Monologue.Original: “Will you go buy that{Line} spice we always use?{Line} We’re out.”

Monologue.Current: “Увидимся.”
Monologue.Original: “See you later.”

Monologue.Current: “Любовь слепа, // девчонка{Line} товарищ «малыш»?”
Monologue.Original: “Love is blind, huh?{Line} Mr. Big Brother.”

Monologue.Current: “О ч-чём ты?..” // Не встречал в игре
Monologue.Original: “W-W-What are you saying?”

Monologue.Current: “I haven’t seen{Line} your sister today.”
Monologue.Original: “I haven’t seen{Line} your sister today.”

Monologue.Current: “Oh, she came down{Line} with a cold.”
Monologue.Original: “Oh, she came down{Line} with a cold.”

Monologue.Current: “Oh no. Is she ok?”
Monologue.Original: “Oh no. Is she ok?”

Monologue.Current: “Huh?{Line} Oh yeah, she’s fine.”
Monologue.Original: “Huh?{Line} Oh yeah, she’s fine.”

Monologue.Current: “Dr. Kadowaki said it’s{Line} just a cold.”
Monologue.Original: “Dr. Kadowaki said it’s{Line} just a cold.”

Monologue.Current: “Good morning!”
Monologue.Original: “Good morning!”

Monologue.Current: “Mornin’.{Line} Are you feeling better?”
Monologue.Original: “Mornin’.{Line} Are you feeling better?”

Monologue.Current: “Yes. Thank you.”
Monologue.Original: “Yes. Thank you.”

Monologue.Current: “You’ll get sick again if{Line} you don’t take it easy.”
Monologue.Original: “You’ll get sick again if{Line} you don’t take it easy.”

Monologue.Current: “Oh pooh.{Line} What are you, my brother?”
Monologue.Original: “Oh pooh.{Line} What are you, my brother?”

Monologue.Current: “Well, see you later.”
Monologue.Original: “Well, see you later.”

Monologue.Current: “Эй, {Char Squall}. Говорят, тебе{Line} осталось последнее испытание.”
Monologue.Original: “Hey, {Char Squall}. I heard you still have{Line} one more unit to finish.”

Monologue.Current: “{Color Blue}〖Огненная пещера〗{Color White}, да?{Line} Чувак, там РЕАЛЬНО ЖАРКО!”
Monologue.Original: “The {Color Blue}〖Fire Cavern〗{Color White}, right?{Line} Man, that place is HOT!”

Monologue.Current: “Ну, удачи в охоте на стража!”
Monologue.Original: “Well, good luck.{Line} Go get yourself a GF.”

Monologue.Current: “Ну, удачи в охоте на стража!”
Monologue.Original: “Well, good luck.{Line} Go get yourself a GF.”

Monologue.Current: “Йо, {Char Squall}!{Line} Инструктор Трип уже{Line} ушла к главным воротам.”
Monologue.Original: “Yo, {Char Squall},{Line} Instructer Trepe already{Line} headed for the front gate.”

Monologue.Current: “Инструктор Трип ждёт тебя{Line} у главных ворот.”
Monologue.Original: “Instructor Trepe went{Line} to the front gate already.”

Monologue.Current: “Удачи на экзамене!”
Monologue.Original: “Good luck with{Line} the SeeD exam.”

Monologue.Current: // Негр слева, после сдачи экзамена{Line}“Ты обошёл меня.{Line} Придётся заниматься получше.”
Monologue.Original: “You’ve beaten me to it.{Line} Guess I’ll just have to{Line} work harder{Line} from now on.”

Monologue.Current: // Мальчишка слева, после сдачи экзамена{Line}“Чтобы стать сидом,{Line} нужно хорошо учиться!”
Monologue.Original: “Must study hard to{Line} become a SeeD!”

Monologue.Current: // Мальчишка слева, после сдачи экзамена{Line}“О, {Char Squall}, ты вовремя!{Line} Помнишь последнюю лекцию?”
Monologue.Original: “Oh, {Char Squall}, glad to run into you.{Line} Remember that last lecture?”

Monologue.Current: “Ну ту, о ганблейдах?”
Monologue.Original: “You know, on gunblades.”

Monologue.Current: “Я слышал, что вы с {Char Seifer}ом{Line} единственные, кто владеет{Line} этими штуками...”
Monologue.Original: “I heard you and Seifer{Line} are the only students to{Line} choose gunblade as your specialty.”

Monologue.Current: “Ты бы не мог мне его показать?”
Monologue.Original: “Would you mind{Line} showing it to me?”

Monologue.Current: Смотри{Line}Нет
Monologue.Original: Sure, I’ll let you see it{Line}Nah

Monologue.Current: // Если согласился показать ганблейд{Line}Господин Аки{Line}“ЭЙ ТЫ, размахивающий ганблейдом!”
Monologue.Original: Mr. Aki{Line}“HEY YOU, swinging{Line} that gunblade!”

Monologue.Current: Господин Аки{Line}“{Char Squall}!!!{Line} Это ты что ли был?!”
Monologue.Original: Mr. Aki{Line}“{Char Squall}!!!{Line} Was that you!?”

Monologue.Current: Господин Аки{Line}“Ты нарушил правила сада.{Line} Ты будешь наказн!”
Monologue.Original: Mr. Aki{Line}“This is against school regulations.{Line} You’re going to be penalized!”

Monologue.Current: Господин Аки{Line}“Сиды должны соблюдать правила{Line} общественного порядка, быть примером{Line} для остальных! А ты даже правилам{Line} академии следовать не можешь?!”
Monologue.Original: Mr. Aki{Line}“How can I expect you to live by{Line} society’s rules when you can’t{Line} even obey school rules!?”

Monologue.Current: // Перед отъездом в Доллет{Line}“Слушай, сегодня же полевой экзамен?”
Monologue.Original: “Hey, weren’t they conducting{Line} the final SeeD exam today?”

Monologue.Current: “Ага. Отобрали двенадцать человек.”
Monologue.Original: “Yes.{Line} I heard only 12 people{Line} qualified for the field exam.”

Monologue.Current: “Интересно, все сдадут?”
Monologue.Original: “I wonder how many{Line} will pass?”

Monologue.Current: “Сомневаюсь! Обычно, больше{Line} половины проваливаются.”
Monologue.Original: “Oh, the failure rate is{Line} quite high.”

Monologue.Current: “Я слышала, что в этот раз{Line} {Char Squall} будет сдавать...”
Monologue.Original: “And I heard that{Line} {Char Squall} is taking it this time...”

Monologue.Current: // После подслушивания разговора девчонок{Line}“Ой!”
Monologue.Original: “Oh!”

Monologue.Current: “И давно ты слушаешь?”
Monologue.Original: “How long have you{Line} been listening?”

Monologue.Current: “I’m gonna try harder to make it to{Line} the field exam next time.”
Monologue.Original: “I’m gonna try harder to make it to{Line} the field exam next time.”

Monologue.Current: “Me, too!”
Monologue.Original: “Me, too!”

Monologue.Current: // Девчонки внизу после сдачи экзамена{Line}“Я слышала, что экзамен{Line} сдали всего четыре человека.”
Monologue.Original: “I heard 4 people{Line} passed the last SeeD exam.”

Monologue.Current: “Ага. Жуть.”
Monologue.Original: “Yes.{Line} Quite impressive.”

Monologue.Current: “Три парня и одна новенькая.”
Monologue.Original: “I heard one of them{Line} was a girl.”

Monologue.Current: “Ну, это немножко обнадёживает.”
Monologue.Original: “Oh,{Line} that’s encouraging.”

Monologue.Current: “And also among them was{Line} {Char Squall}...”
Monologue.Original: “And also among them was{Line} {Char Squall}...”

Monologue.Current: // Девчонка №1 после сдачи экзамена{Line}“Нужно лучше готовиться!”
Monologue.Original: “I’ll have to try and{Line} try even harder!”

Monologue.Current: “Hey...umm,{Line} when is the final SeeD exam?”
Monologue.Original: “Hey...umm,{Line} when is the final SeeD exam?”

Monologue.Current: “It’s today!{Line} You didn’t know!?”
Monologue.Original: “It’s today!{Line} You didn’t know!?”

Monologue.Current: “Oh, really!?{Line} Gosh...”
Monologue.Original: “Oh, really!?{Line} Gosh...”

Monologue.Current: “So how many girls{Line} are taking the exam?”
Monologue.Original: “So how many girls{Line} are taking the exam?”

Monologue.Current: “I think only 1{Line} this time around.”
Monologue.Original: “I think only 1{Line} this time around.”

Monologue.Current: “Oh, only 1?{Line} Geez. I hope she does well.”
Monologue.Original: “Oh, only 1?{Line} Geez. I hope she does well.”

Monologue.Current: // Две девушки идут к классу{Line}“Где ты достала такую помаду?”
Monologue.Original: “Hey,{Line} can I see your lipstick?”

Monologue.Current: “Вот эту?”
Monologue.Original: “Sure thing.{Line} Is this the one?”

Monologue.Current: “Ага! Нигде не могу{Line} найти такой цвет!”
Monologue.Original: “Yeah! I can’t find{Line} this color anywhere.”

Monologue.Current: “Правда? Без проблем,{Line} я знаю одно местечко.{Line} В следующий раз куплю и тебе.”
Monologue.Original: “Oh really?{Line} I know where you can get it.{Line} I’ll pick one up for you.”

Monologue.Original: “Oh, hey, hey.”
